string.name: app_instructions
string.p: This program is a mobile application designed to help users manage their academic progress. It allows users to create, view, and edit terms, courses, and assessments.\n
To get started, you can navigate using the action bar to the "Terms" tab to view all of your created terms. Here, you will be able to see the start and end date of each term.\n

\nTo create a new term, you can click on the "+" button the center right side of the "Terms" tab. To edit a term, you can hold down on the desired term and it will bring you to an editing page. To delete a term, you can swipe left or right on the term in the list. However, please note that you will not be able to delete a term if there are courses within the dates of that term.\n

\nIn the "Courses" tab, you will be able to view all of your created courses and filter the list by the associated term. By selecting a course, you will be able to view the details of the course. You can also create, edit, or delete a course the same way with the terms as previously mentioned.\n

\nIn the "Assessments" tab, you will be able to view all of your created assessments and filter the list by an associated course. By selecting an assessment, you will be able to view the details of the assessment. You can also create, edit, or delete an assessment the same way as previously mentioned. Note that deleting a course will also delete all associated assessments.\n
